content.title: Tagore National Scholarship for Cultural Research
content.details: The Scheme 'Tagore National Scholarship for Cultural Research' has been introduced to invigorate and revitalize the various institutions under the Ministry of Culture (MoC) and other identified cultural institutions in the country, by encouraging scholars/academicians to affiliate themselves with these institutions to work on projects of mutual interest.
benefits: Contingency grant up to ₹10,000 per month for Non-MoC institutions
House Rent Allowance of up to 30% of the honorarium
eligibility: A scholar with good academic credentials and at least one publication
documents_required: A write-up/synopsis of proposed research work
A short write-up on how the proposed research project will benefit the Nodal Institution
NoC, if a regular Central/State Government Employee

faqs.question: What is the 'Tagore National Scholarship for Cultural Research' Scheme?
faqs.answer: The Scheme has been introduced to invigorate and revitalize the various institutions under the Ministry of Culture (MoC) and other identified cultural institutions in the country, by encouraging Scholars/academicians to affiliate themselves with these institutions to work on projects of mutual interest.

faqs.question: Which is the implementing agency of this scheme?
faqs.answer: Institutions under the Ministry of Culture, Government of India.

faqs.question: Who are eligible to apply under the scheme?
faqs.answer: A scholar with good academic credentials and at least one publication, either a book or a research paper in reputed journals, and 2 years of research/teaching experience.

faqs.question: What is the number of Scholarships awarded annually?
faqs.answer: The scheme envisages the granting of up to 25 Scholarships in a year.

faqs.question: What is the scope of this Scheme?
faqs.answer: The scope of the Scheme is to enable the identified cultural institutions to engage Scholars of outstanding merit, to work on research projects in order to unravel their unexplored resources.

faqs.question: Can young artists/performers apply for the scholarship?
faqs.answer: Yes, this scheme also gives opportunities to young artists/performers to apply for the scholarship.

faqs.question: How much will the monthly Scholarship be given to the eligible Scholar?
faqs.answer: The scholarship honorarium will be ₹50,000/- per month.

faqs.question: What is the duration of the Scholarship?
faqs.answer: The duration of the Tagore Scholarship is up to 2 years.
